verses.text_plain: Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God,
verses.verse_html: 1Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God,

verses.text_plain: (Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures,)
verses.verse_html: 2(Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures,)

verses.text_plain: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord, which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh;
verses.verse_html: 3Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord, which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh;

verses.text_plain: And declared to be the Son of God with power, according to the spirit of holiness, by the resurrection from the dead:
verses.verse_html: 4And declared to be the Son of God with power, according to the spirit of holiness, by the resurrection from the dead:

verses.text_plain: By whom we have received grace and apostleship, for obedience to the faith among all nations, for his name:
verses.verse_html: 5By whom we have received grace and apostleship, for obedience to the faith among all nations, for his name:

verses.text_plain: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ:
verses.verse_html: 6Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ:

verses.text_plain: To all that be in Rome, beloved of God, called to be saints: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.verse_html: 7To all that be in Rome, beloved of God, called to be saints: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.text_plain: First, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all, that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world.
verses.verse_html: 8First, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all, that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world.

verses.text_plain: For God is my witness, whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son, that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers;
verses.verse_html: 9For God is my witness, whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son, that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers;

verses.text_plain: Making request, if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you.
verses.verse_html: 10Making request, if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you.

tokens.text: I might have a prosperous journey

verses.text_plain: For I long to see you, that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift, to the end ye may be established;
verses.verse_html: 11For I long to see you, that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift, to the end ye may be established;

verses.text_plain: That is, that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me.
verses.verse_html: 12That is, that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me.

tokens.text: that I may be comforted together

verses.text_plain: Now I would not have you ignorant, brethren, that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you, (but was let hitherto,) that I might have some fruit among you also, even as among other Gentiles.
verses.verse_html: 13Now I would not have you ignorant, brethren, that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you, (but was let hitherto,) that I might have some fruit among you also, even as among other Gentiles.

verses.text_plain: I am debtor both to the Greeks, and to the Barbarians; both to the wise, and to the unwise.
verses.verse_html: 14I am debtor both to the Greeks, and to the Barbarians; both to the wise, and to the unwise.

verses.text_plain: So, as much as in me is, I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also.
verses.verse_html: 15So, as much as in me is, I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also.

verses.text_plain: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ: for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth; to the Jew first, and also to the Greek.
verses.verse_html: 16For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ: for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth; to the Jew first, and also to the Greek.

verses.text_plain: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith: as it is written, The just shall live by faith.
verses.verse_html: 17For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith: as it is written, The just shall live by faith.

verses.text_plain: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men, who hold the truth in unrighteousness;
verses.verse_html: 18For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men, who hold the truth in unrighteousness;

verses.text_plain: Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them; for God hath shewed it unto them.
verses.verse_html: 19Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them; for God hath shewed it unto them.

verses.text_plain: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead; so that they are without excuse:
verses.verse_html: 20For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead; so that they are without excuse:

tokens.text: by the things that are made

verses.text_plain: Because that, when they knew God, they glorified him not as God, neither were thankful; but became vain in their imaginations, and their foolish heart was darkened.
verses.verse_html: 21Because that, when they knew God, they glorified him not as God, neither were thankful; but became vain in their imaginations, and their foolish heart was darkened.

verses.text_plain: Professing themselves to be wise, they became fools,
verses.verse_html: 22Professing themselves to be wise, they became fools,

verses.text_plain: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man, and to birds, and fourfooted beasts, and creeping things.
verses.verse_html: 23And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man, and to birds, and fourfooted beasts, and creeping things.

verses.text_plain: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts, to dishonour their own bodies between themselves:
verses.verse_html: 24Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts, to dishonour their own bodies between themselves:

verses.text_plain: Who changed the truth of God into a lie, and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator, who is blessed for ever. Amen.
verses.verse_html: 25Who changed the truth of God into a lie, and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator, who is blessed for ever. Amen.

verses.text_plain: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections: for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature:
verses.verse_html: 26 For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections: for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature:

verses.text_plain: And likewise also the men, leaving the natural use of the woman, burned in their lust one toward another; men with men working that which is unseemly, and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet.
verses.verse_html: 27And likewise also the men, leaving the natural use of the woman, burned in their lust one toward another; men with men working that which is unseemly, and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet.

verses.text_plain: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge, God gave them over to a reprobate mind, to do those things which are not convenient;
verses.verse_html: 28And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge, God gave them over to a reprobate mind, to do those things which are not convenient;

verses.text_plain: Being filled with all unrighteousness, fornication, wickedness, covetousness, maliciousness; full of envy, murder, debate, deceit, malignity; whisperers,
verses.verse_html: 29Being filled with all unrighteousness, fornication, wickedness, covetousness, maliciousness; full of envy, murder, debate, deceit, malignity; whisperers,

verses.text_plain: Backbiters, haters of God, despiteful, proud, boasters, inventors of evil things, disobedient to parents,
verses.verse_html: 30Backbiters, haters of God, despiteful, proud, boasters, inventors of evil things, disobedient to parents,

verses.text_plain: Without understanding, covenantbreakers, without natural affection, implacable, unmerciful:
verses.verse_html: 31Without understanding, covenantbreakers, without natural affection, implacable, unmerciful:

verses.text_plain: Who knowing the judgment of God, that they which commit such things are worthy of death, not only do the same, but have pleasure in them that do them.
verses.verse_html: 32Who knowing the judgment of God, that they which commit such things are worthy of death, not only do the same, but have pleasure in them that do them.
